alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 12:00PM AKST until January 14 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...High winds with blowing snow and low visibility expected. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times with whiteout conditions possible. * WHERE...Central Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will increase through the day with the strongest winds late tonight through Sunday morning.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for blowing snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
